title: Rissanen returned to Charlotte without a shift
text:
Rissanen returned to Charlotte without a shift 
Posted 42 minutes ago Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Are you human? * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters 
Rasmus Rissanen, called up on Tuesday from the Charlotte Checkers, was returned to the American Hockey League (AHL) without playing a shift. 
Rissanen joined the Hurricanes for the teamâ€™s 1-0 overtime win at Colorado on Wednesday, but he did not see ice time. 
He will join the Checkers in Grand Rapids, MI, in advance of their game against the Griffins on Friday.
